page.title: 02LIVING IN NORTH HAYLING
page.content: We found that most people liked living in North Hayling. 20 people said that they did not like living on Hayling.110 people said they liked living on Hayling(10 very much so). From the 140 questionnaires that we got back from the people in North Hayling: 69 people like living there because of the peace and quiet;30 of them liked living there because of the sea;33 for other various reasons and 8 wouldn't say. 40 people said they preferred North Hayling when they first came. 15 people said no change. 6 people said they prefer North Hayling now. 8 people said they hadn't lived here long enough. The rest had no preference.
